page.title: 08The Woodman Inn, Otford.
page.content: We interviewed the licencee of "The Woodman" who has been at the pub for nearly four years. "The Woodman" is openfrom 10.00am to 2.30pm and from 6.00pm to 11.00pm. Six people help to run the pub, some of them working part-time. It was built in about 1600 and has always been an inn. The most expensive drink is Swiss beer and the cheapest is orange squash. The most popu drink is bitter beer. The publican also sells food, crisps, nuts sandwiches and sometimes coffee. He keeps 1500 pints of beer in the cellar which lasts just over a week. Beer is delivered weekly. Darts,dominoes and cribbage are played and there is a fruit machine. Pets are allowed in the pub, mostly dogs. Some of the Kent Cricket Team visit the pub.
